items.short_desc: The mini auction would be a day-long event but the venue, time and other details of the auction are not yet mentioned
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League 2021 auction likely to happen on February 11

items.short_desc: With only four months left for the next Indian T20 League, BCCI decided to include 10 teams in the 2022 edition of the competition instead.
items.asset_title: BCCI approves 10-team Indian T20 League from 2022 edition

items.short_desc: Glenn Maxwell, who failed to put in decent performances in the 2020 Indian T20 League, said that Sehwag is in the media for such statements.
items.asset_title: Glenn Maxwell responds to Sehwag's "10 crore cheerleader" jibe

items.short_desc: We look at the key points that enabled Mumbai's success this past season and how they can keep it going next year.
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League 2020 Learnings: How Mumbai claimed their fifth title

items.short_desc: With the next season reportedly less than five months away, we take a look at the biggest weaknesses in each team's roster and how they can address them in the upcoming auction.
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League 2020 Learnings: What do each team need next season?

items.short_desc: Watch Riddhima Pathak along with Brett Lee's season review of this edition of the Indian T20 League.
items.asset_title: DRS with Brett Lee | Indian T20 League | Episode 6

items.short_desc: Watch Riddhima Pathak along with Brett Lee review the final stage of the tournament.
items.asset_title: DRS with Brett Lee | Indian T20 League | Episode 5

items.short_desc: Brett Lee has been part of some Lee-gendary Duels with some of the world's finest and here's the man himself reminiscing about the battle with the players he's dismissed the most in each format of the game!
items.asset_title: Brett Lee's Most Dismissals in Each Format | Leegendary Duels

items.short_desc: Watch Riddhima Pathak along with Brett Lee review the tussle of the top four.
items.asset_title: DRS with Brett Lee | Indian T20 League | Episode 4

items.short_desc: Ridhima Pathak and Brett Lee look back at the Super Overs, the bowlers coming good, and a lot more in the latest episode of Doubtful Review System.
items.asset_title: DRS with Brett Lee | Indian T20 League | Episode 3
